FuncDef: The reset statistics fabric-queue command deletes statistics about the upstream unicast VoQs on a board.
CLIs: reset statistics fabric-queue unicast slot <inbound-slot-num> [ outbound slot <outbound-slot-num> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the board for which VoQs are destined.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 16.

Specifies the board where the VoQs are buffered.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 16.

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset statistics fabric-queue unicast slot 1 outbound slot 2
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To delete statistics about upstream unicast VoQs on a board, run the reset statistics fabric-queue command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
